description: Color family classification system based on HSL (Hue, Saturation, Lightness) color values. The algorithm first checks for achromatic colors (white, black, grey) based on extreme lightness or low saturation values, then identifies brown shades by combining hue range with saturation and lightness thresholds, and finally classifies remaining colors by their hue angle on the color wheel.

families.name: Red Shades
families.description: Colors dominated by red hues, including pure reds, crimsons, and scarlets

families.name: Orange Shades
families.description: Warm colors between red and yellow, including tangerines, corals, and peaches
families.conditions: Hue >= 10 AND Hue < 45 AND (Saturation > 40 OR Lightness > 50)

families.name: Yellow Shades
families.description: Bright warm colors including golds, lemons, and canary yellows

families.name: Green Shades
families.description: Colors ranging from yellow-greens to teals, including limes, emeralds, and forests

families.name: Blue Shades
families.description: Cool colors from cyan to deep blue, including sky blues, navies, and cobalts

families.name: Purple Shades
families.description: Colors between blue and magenta, including violets, lavenders, and indigos

families.name: Pink Shades
families.description: Light to vivid magenta-reds, including roses, fuchsias, and magentas

families.name: Brown Shades
families.description: Desaturated warm colors with lower lightness, including tans, chestnuts, and siennas
families.conditions: (Saturation <= 50 AND Lightness <= 45 AND (Hue >= 0 AND Hue <= 45 OR Hue >= 350)) OR (Hue >= 10 AND Hue < 45 AND Saturation <= 40 AND Lightness <= 50)

families.name: Grey Shades
families.description: Neutral colors with very low saturation, from light silver to dark charcoal

families.name: White Shades
families.description: Very light colors approaching pure white, including ivory, cream, and snow

families.name: Black Shades
families.description: Very dark colors approaching pure black, including jet, onyx, and ebony

families.name: Other
families.description: Colors that don't fit into the defined categories
families.conditions: Fallback when no other conditions match
